definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The intensity of the X-ray emission is correlated to thebrightness of the orange coloring.
sentences.chinese: X射線的輻射強度與橙色的亮度相關。

sentences.english: Infrared imaging acquires the image information from the intensity distribution of the infrared radiation.
sentences.chinese: 紅外成像利用紅外輻射強度分佈來獲取圖像信息。

sentences.english: Thermochromic glass varies its optical properties in response to temperature variations.
sentences.chinese: 光致變色玻璃的透射率隨當時輻射強度發生改變。

sentences.english: The emission intensity is given by the absorptance of the volume in which there is a difference of the quasi Fermi energies.
sentences.chinese: 輻射強度由存在準費米能級差的體積的吸收率決定。
